definition: a series of (usually metal) rings or links fitted into one another to make a flexible ligament, to fasten or secure with chains
details:
noun
- a series of (usually metal) rings or links fitted into one another to make a flexible ligament
- a necklace made by a stringing objects together
= synonyms: string
- anything that acts as a restraint
- a linked or connected series of objects
= example: a linked or connected series of objects
- (business) a number of similar establishments (stores or restaurants or banks or hotels or theaters) under one ownership
- a series of things depending on each other as if linked together
= example: a series of things depending on each other as if linked together
= synonyms: concatenation
- (chemistry) a series of linked atoms (generally in an organic molecule)
= synonyms: chemical chain
- a series of hills or mountains
= synonyms: range, mountain range, range of mountains, mountain chain, chain of mountains
- a unit of length
verb
- to fasten or secure with chains
- to connect or arrange into a chain by linking
